panels.name: Searchable Documents Indexed by Domain and Region

metricsQueries.query: _sourceCategory=*cloudwatch/metrics* Namespace=AWS/CloudSearch metric=SearchableDocuments Statistic=Sum | sum by Region, DomainName

panels.name: Events by Domain
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* cloudsearch
| json "eventSource"
| where eventSource matches "*cloudsearch*"
| json "awsRegion", "eventName", "sourceIPAddress"
| json "requestParameters.domainNames" as domainNames
| parse field=domainNames "[\"*\"]" as domainNames
| count by domainNames, eventName
| transpose row domainNames column eventName

panels.name: Successful Requests by Domain and Region

metricsQueries.query: _sourceCategory=*cloudwatch/metrics* Namespace=AWS/CloudSearch metric=SuccessfulRequests Statistic=Sum | sum by DomainName, Region
_sourceCategory=*cloudwatch/metrics* Namespace=AWS/CloudSearch metric=Partitions Statistic=Sum | sum by DomainName

panels.name: Average Index Utilization by Domain Name

metricsQueries.query: _sourceCategory=*cloudwatch/metrics* Namespace=AWS/CloudSearch metric=IndexUtilization Statistic=Average | avg by DomainName

panels.name: Error Messages by Domain
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* cloudsearch error*
| json "eventSource"
| where eventSource matches "*cloudsearch*"
| json "awsRegion", "eventName", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage"
| json "requestParameters.domainName" as domainName
| count as errors by errormessage, domainName
| sort errors

panels.name: Events by Region Over Time
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* cloudsearch
| json "eventSource"
| where eventSource matches "*cloudsearch*"
| json "awsRegion", "eventName", "sourceIPAddress"
| timeslice 30m
| count by _timeslice, eventname, awsregion
| transpose row _timeslice column eventname, awsregion

panels.name: Delete, Create, and Update Events Over Time
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* cloudsearch
| json "eventSource"
| where eventSource matches "*cloudsearch*"
| json "awsRegion", "eventName", "sourceIPAddress"
| json "requestParameters.domainName" as domainName nodrop
| where eventname matches "*Delete*" or eventname matches "*Create*" or eventname matches "*Update*"
| if (isBlank(domainName), "No Domain", domainName) as domainName
| timeslice 30m 
| count by _timeslice, eventname, domainName
| transpose row _timeslice column eventname, domainName
